xml.name: Rename
xml.Try: You can rename anything by placing the caret on a symbol and using the Rename refactoring. Place the caret on the deviceName field anywhere in the code, and then press RenameElement.
Enter a new name for this field. For example, type tabletName, and then save the result by pressing EditorEnter.
automatically detects the matching getter method when you rename a field and recommends refactoring it. Place the caret on the stylus field and start renaming it with RenameElement.
Replace stylus with pencil, for example, and then complete the refactoring by pressing EditorEnter.
